title: Localized Regional Environmental Risk in Mountainous Urban Areas of Southwest China: Identification, Assessment, and Management Strategies in Kunming
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00449C, Paper
Wei Jin, Qianwen Mo, Guihong Li, Gang Wang, Binqiang Zhu, Xing Wan, Peng Lin, Bin Huang, Xuejun Pan
In recent decades, the escalating frequency of environmental risk events, arising from sources such as industrial accidents, chemical spills, or other anthropogenic activities, has intensified threats to the ecological environment....
